claim_card.claim: Phase 2 asserts that hardware and coherence grammar blur, and computation becomes direct gradient reconciliation rather than symbolic/state processing.
claim_card.test_hook: Define an operational proxy for 'direct reconciliation' (e.g., closed-loop analog optimization latency/energy) and compare against a state-based baseline.
claim_card.evidence_excerpt: Hardware and coherence grammar blur; computation becomes direct gradient reconciliation.
